cards.title: The Baddies
setup: At the start of the game, {TheBaddies} enters play “Are we tho?“ side up.
One “Smash-Back Field“ is put into play. The Villain Deck is shuffled.
gameplay: At the end of the villain turn, destroy 1 hero ongoing card.
When {TheBaddies} would be destroyed, their Villain Character card flips to the “How did you get here?“ side instead.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, destroy 1 equipment card.
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, {TheBaddies}'s maximum HP is 30. {TheBaddies} is restored to 30 HP.

openingLines.default: I'm bad! I'm bad! You know it, you know.

cards.title: Fire Everything!
cards.body: {TheBaddies} deals each non-villain target 5 Psychic damage.

cards.title: Wright Weigh
body: At the end of the villain turn, each villain target regains {H} HP.

flavorQuotes.text: There's a Wright Weigh, and there's a Ronway.

cards.title: Smash-Back Field
cards.body: The first time {TheBaddies} is dealt damage by a target each turn, {TheBaddies} deals that target 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You hurt me - I hurt you!

promoCards.title: The Baddies
setup: At the start of the game, {TheBaddies} enters play “We really are!“ side up.
gameplay: At the start of the Villain turn, {TheBaddies} deals the Hero Target with the highest HP {H} Toxic Damage.
When {TheBaddies} would be destroyed, their Villain Character card flips to the “What!“ side instead.
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, {TheBaddies}'s maximum HP is 20. {TheBaddies} is restored to 20 HP.

openingLines.default: The other one isn't really bad. I'm the baddest!
